content:
On Nov PERIOD  the Lied Center for Performing Arts will be home to the  Tony Award winner for Best Musical Monty Pythons Spamalot. the production has been touring across the U.S PERIOD for much of the fall and is on its way to amuse Lincoln audiences PERIOD

Spamalot is a theatrical adaptation of the  cult classic movie Monty Python and the Holy Grail. this musical captures the movies iconic slapstick physical humor and shenanigans through dialogue while also adding equally humorous songs and dances to the mix PERIOD

According to a Lied Center press release This outrageous musical comedy is lovingly ripped off from the film classic Monty Python and the Holy Grail. monty Pythons Spamalot tells the legendary tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table and their quest for the Holy Grail. although the production was inspired by film there was still considerable effort put into the production to make a transition from camera to stage natural PERIOD However the show still emphasizes the originality of Spamalot. the show is directed and choreographed by Sam Viverito with a new book from Eric Idle PERIOD Monty Pythons Spamalot also features music and lyrics by the GrammyAward winning duo of Idle and John Du Prez PERIOD

Tickets start at  and are available now at The Lied Centers website and box office PERIOD University of NebraskaLincoln students are eligible to buy tickets at half price with a valid NCard PERIOD Anyone under the age of  is also able to purchase tickets with the same discount PERIOD
